BANNER.title: START YOUR JOURNEY IN
BANNER.tips: Unlock exclusive NFT heroes and fight for honor!

INVITATION.title:
SNK Officially
Authorized NFT
desc: In 2077, a world-class mixed martial arts competition in parallel time and space is around the corner. Fighting masters all over the world gather in FEOVERSE, and a contest across time and space is about to be staged.
Every fighter would eliminate opponents from parallel space-time, then obtain his/her energy to become stronger.
The fighting competition is approaching. However, fighters are missing one by one, and this might have something to do with a mysterious organization. A terrifying conspiracy is about to emerge…

CARDSWIPER.title:
The first fighter
to appear on the stage
SWIPER_TEXT_LIST: Mai Shiranui, a classic character image of SNK, is a deeply rooted female ninja-playing opponent with gorgeous movements, coquettish costumes and an iconic fan in the palm of her hand.

When the fighting kicks off, this glamorous female fighter is the first to fight. To fully awaken the potential hidden in her body, Mai Shiranui will transform into 7777 avatars to enter different parallel space-time. The fighters start to see the ultimate upgrading path to the king of fighting.
In Fighter Era Odyssey, each Mai Shiranui NFT is a unique, collectible NFT stored on the Ethereum blockchain.

FEOVERSE.title: FEOVERSE
FEOVERSE.desc: The FEOVERSE will build an immersive metaverse where fans and collectors could stake their claims in a collaborative world of collecting.

item.title: TERMS OF USE
cont: THESE TERMS OF USE CONSTITUTE A LEGALLY BINDING AGREEMENT BETWEEN YOU AND FIGHTER ERA ODYSSEY.

You are not authorized to access and/or use the service or any licensed products if you do not agree to these terms of use. The services are offered and available only to users who are 18 years of age or older. By using the services, you represent and warrant that you are of legal age to form a binding contract with FEO. these terms of use represent the complete agreement between you and FEO concerning the service and supersede any prior or concurrent agreement, representation or understanding between you and FEO or by any FEO representative. You are bound by these terms of use even if you, when accessing or using the service or any licensed products, are acting on behalf of another person or entity.

We may update these Terms from time to time. Please ensure you check the Terms each time you access or use this Site. If we make material changes to these Terms, we will post the revised Terms and the revised effective date at the bottom of these Terms. Your continued use of any of the Service after the date of any such changes become effective constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
Your personal information will be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy: https://feoverse.com/privacy .

No one at FEO is authorized to modify these Terms with you or otherwise enter into an agreement with you that conflicts with these Terms, except by means of a written agreement signed by an authorized agent of FEO or as described above in these Terms, and any other purported modifications or alterations or conflicting terms will be null and void.
PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY, AS THEY CONTAIN AN AGREEMENT TO ARBITRATE AND OTHER IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING YOUR LEGAL RIGHTS, REMEDIES, AND OBLIGATIONS.

cont: We reserve the right to introduce, withdraw or amend websites, or any content, material, product offering or other Services, in our sole discretion without notice. If you are using a public or shared computer, you also agree to ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session. item.title: YOUR RIGHTS
cont: If you transfer your collectible for any reason, any and all licenses and other rights granted to you under these Terms, automatically and immediately terminate and such license and rights shall transfer to the new purchaser of the collectible, and you will have no further rights in the collectible that has been transferred; provided that, for the avoidance of doubt, you shall still be able to use and access the Services following a transfer of all of your collectibles if you are otherwise in compliance with the Terms.

As used herein, 'Own' (and any variations thereof, including 'Owns,' 'Owned,' 'Owner,' or 'Ownership') means with respect to a collectible, ownership of the NFT associated with a collectible that a person has rightfully and lawfully purchased, redeemed or acquired from a legitimate source in accordance with these Terms, where proof of purchase, redemption or acquisition was recorded on the applicable blockchain and ownership of the NFT can be proven. Notwithstanding any additional restrictions set forth in the Terms, you agree that, with respect to any collectible you purchased and properly obtained, you may not, nor permit any third party to do or attempt to do, any of the foregoing: (a) modify, distort, mutilate, or perform any other modification to the related NFT Media; (b) use the related NFT Media to advertise, market, or sell any third-party product or service; (c) use the related NFT Media in connection with images, videos, or other forms of media that depict hatred, intolerance, violence, cruelty, or anything else that could reasonably be found to constitute hate speech or otherwise infringe upon the rights of others; (d) incorporate the related NFT Media in movies, videos, video games, or any other forms of media for a commercial purpose; (e) sell, distribute for commercial gain, or otherwise commercialize merchandise that includes, contains, or consists of representations of the related NFT Media; (f) attempt to trademark, copyright, or otherwise acquire additional intellectual property rights in or to the related NFT Media; or (g) attempt to mint, tokenize, or create an additional cryptographic token representing or associated with the related NFT Media.

Thank you for your interest in Fighter Era Odyssey.

GALLERY.title: A world class fighting competition KOF {{symbol}} in FEOVERSE is approaching

GALLERY_TOP_LIST.title: FIGHTERS
GALLERY_TOP_LIST.desc: All the famous fighters here, Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, Mai Shiranui…… they will face opponents with same skills in parallel space-time.

GALLERY_TOP_LIST.title: RULE
GALLERY_TOP_LIST.desc: Here, the fighters’ mission is to defeat their doppelgangers from another world. The winners can absorb losers’ energy and become stronger, then compete to win the title of Ultimate Fighting King.

GALLERY_TOP_LIST.title: NOW
GALLERY_TOP_LIST.desc: The competition is about to kick off, and fighters have already arrived at the competition field one after another. The following is the background of these fighters.

item.title: What are Fighter Era Odyssey digital collectibles (NFT)?
cont: SNK officially authorized series of NFTs. Mai Shiranui is the first collection of the series and each of them is a unique, collectible NFT stored on the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: How do I acquire a FEO NFT?
cont: You can acquire one through official website and also buy one on the marketplace, such as opensea

item.title: What time does the mint start?
cont: Pre-sale: 13:00PM (UTC+9) Feb 23, 2023
Public sale: 21:00PM (UTC+9) Feb 23, 2023.

item.title: How many Mai Shiranui NFTs can each address mint at most?
cont: Pre-sale: Whitelists can mint up to 2 ones, while Kachousen NFT holders can mint up to 5 ones.
Public sale: No limit.

item.title: What can collectors do with their Mai Shiranui NFTs?
cont: Each series of NFTs is an invitation to each FEO fighting era and participate in era missions. In Genesis Mai Shiranui Era, holders can take part in collection of fragments of treasure map, NFT staking and R-Epoch Gashapon.

item.title: What are the benefits if holding Kachousen NFT?
cont: Kachousen NFT is accessory of Mai Shiranui, which is limited to 3333 copies and will be used as accelerator during the NFT staking process. If staking Mai Shiranui NFT with Kachousen NFT, they can obtain extra 50% of candy bonus. In addition, Kachousen NFT holders can mint up to 5 Mai Shiranui NFTs.

item.title: What is the NFT staking activity in FEOVERSE?
cont: Holders of Mai Shiranui NFT can stake their collection to earn candies and fragments of treasure map. With 10 candies, they can start up Gashapon Machine and get such as 3D costume NFT, fragment of treasure map and rare Mai Shiranui NFT. Winners with all nine complete fragments can share era token incentives.
Learn more: https://medium.com/@FEOVERSE/genesis-era-task-collection-of-treasure-map-fragments-341cd0dedcce

item.title: How soon after mint will staking be available?
cont: NFT staking will be soon launched in the middle of March in 2023. Please look forward and stay tuned.

item.title: What can holders do in FEOVERSE marketplace?
cont: In marketplace, you can freely trade treasure maps, fragments, Kachousen NFTs, Mai Shiranui NFTs.3D costume NFTs and other precious items.
Also, limited-edition skin gallery will soon be launched in FEOVERSE marketplace, where holders of Mai Shiranui NFT can obtain amazing 3D costume NFTs for their collections.

item.title: Is there a future roadmap of FEOVERSE?
cont: FEO will create a series of KOF NFT collections and build an immersive metaverse—FEOVERSE. With a brand-based ecosystem, all FEO NFTs will be co-branded and cooperated with various partners.
FEOVERSE will also build up ecosystem of game projects, enabling gameplay and circular game economies and reach a vibrant DAO of co-creation, co-building, and co-governance with FEO community.

BANNER.title: Mai Shiranui NFT Staking
BANNER.desc: Earn candies and fragments of treasure map by staking NFT

REWARDS.title: STAKING REWARDS
REWARDS.desc: *Kachousen as the core weapon of Mai Shiranui, will be used as an accelerator during the staking to increase candy by 50%.
REWARDS_LIST: NFT holders can stake their collection to earn candies and fragments of treasure map.
Candies are used to obtain a capsule through Gashapon Machine. The lucky ones might get rare NFTs and multiple limited 3D skin NFT
Winners who can collect all the nine pieces of fragments of treasure map can share amazing era token incentives.

STEP2.title: STEP2SELECT NFT TO BE STAKED

STEP2.stakeDesc2: Each address can only use up to 3 Kachosen NFTs as a staking accelerator.
STEP2.empty: Currently, your wallet does not show any Mai Shiranui NFT for staking.

REPOCH.title: Gashapon Machine
REPOCH.desc: In R-Epoch, fighters can unlock new skills through the Gashapon Machine
REPOCH.tip: Have a try. You are the lucky one!
REPOCH_LIST:
Kachousen NFT
Rare Mai Shiranui NFT
3D skin NFT
